```{r Load Inputs}
games_2021 <- 162
ex <- 1.83

apply_adjustments <- function(df1, df2) {
  df1 %>% 
    full_join(df2, by = "tm") %>% 
    mutate(r = r.x + r.y,
           ra = ra.x + ra.y) %>% 
    select(tm, r, ra)
}

team_abbreviation_map <-
  here::here("in", "team_abbrevation_map.csv") %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

standings_2020 <- 
  standings_expanded(2020) %>% 
  filter(tm != 'Avg') %>% 
  mutate(tm = tm %>% stringr::str_sub(start=-3)) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, tm, g:w_l_percent, r, ra) %>% 
  mutate(r = as.numeric(r),
         ra = as.numeric(ra)) %>% 
  rename(r_g = r,
         ra_g = ra)

team_batting_2020 <- 
  team_batting(2020) %>% 
  filter(!tm %in% c('LgAvg','LgTot')) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, tm, h, ba, obp, slg) %>% 
  mutate(h = as.numeric(h), 
         ba = as.numeric(ba),
         obp = as.numeric(obp),
         slg = as.numeric(slg),
         iso = slg - ba)

team_batting_against_2020 <- 
  team_batting_against(2020) %>% 
  filter(!tm %in% c('LgAvg','LgTot')) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(year, tm, h, ba, obp, slg) %>% 
  mutate(h = as.numeric(h),
         ba = as.numeric(ba),
         obp = as.numeric(obp),
         slg = as.numeric(slg),
         iso_a = slg - ba) %>% 
  rename(ha = h,
         ba_a = ba,
         obp_a = obp,
         slg_a = slg)

batting_results_2020 <-
  here::here("in", "2020_batting_results.csv") %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  left_join(team_abbreviation_map) %>% 
  select(tm, war)

batting_projections_2021 <-
  here::here("in", "2021_batting_projections.csv") %>%
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(team)) %>% 
  group_by(team) %>% 
  summarize(war_proj = sum(war)) %>% 
  rename(tm=team) %>% 
  select(tm, war_proj)

pitching_results_2020 <-
  here::here("in", "2020_pitching_results.csv") %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  left_join(team_abbreviation_map) %>% 
  select(tm, war)

pitching_projections_2021 <-
  here::here("in", "2021_pitching_projections.csv") %>%
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(team)) %>% 
  group_by(team) %>% 
  summarize(war_proj = sum(war)) %>% 
  rename(tm=team) %>% 
  select(tm, war_proj)
```
  
Step 1 - Get Data
```{r Step 1} 
team_stats_2020 <- 
  standings_2020 %>% 
  full_join(team_batting_against_2020, by = c("year", "tm")) %>%
  full_join(team_batting_2020, by = c("year", "tm"))

runs_scored_adjustments <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(r_162 = r_g * games_2021,
         ra_162 = ra_g * games_2021,
         r_60 = r_g * g,
         ra_60 = ra_g * g) %>% 
  select(tm, g, r_g, ra_g, r_162:ra_60) %>% 
  summarize(teams = n(),
            across(r_g:ra_60, sum)) %>% 
  mutate(r_g_diff = (ra_g - r_g) / teams ,
         r_162_diff = (ra_162 - r_162) / teams,
         r_60_diff = (ra_60 - r_60) / teams) %>% 
  select(r_g_diff:r_60_diff)

team_stats_2020 <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(r_2020 = r_g * g + runs_scored_adjustments$r_60_diff,
         ra_2020 = ra_g * g,
         r_2021 = r_g * games_2021 + runs_scored_adjustments$r_162_diff,
         ra_2021 = ra_g * games_2021)

step1 <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  select(tm, r_2021, ra_2021) %>% 
  rename(r = r_2021,
         ra = ra_2021)

step1 %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("out", "step1.csv"))

team_projections_2021 <- step1
```

Step 2: Calculate each team's cluster luck adjustments
```{r Step 2}
team_stats_2020 <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(hits_per_run = (h / r_2020))

mean_hits_per_run <- 
  mean(team_stats_2020$hits_per_run) %>% 
  round(3)

team_stats_2020 <- 
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(runs_exp = (h / mean_hits_per_run) %>% round(),
         runs_a_exp = (ha / mean_hits_per_run) %>% round())

step2 <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  mutate(runs_exp = (runs_exp * (games_2021 / g)) %>% round(),
         runs_a_exp = (runs_a_exp * (games_2021 / g)) %>% round()) %>%
    mutate(r = runs_exp - r_2021,
           ra = runs_a_exp - ra_2021) %>% 
  select(tm, r, ra) 

step2 %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("out", "step2.csv"))

team_projections_2021 <- 
  apply_adjustments(team_projections_2021, step2)

```

Step 3: Calculate team offense and pitching WAR adjustments
```{r Step 3}

adjust_war <- function(last_year_results, this_year_projections) {
  team_projections_2021 %>% 
  rename(r_running_adj = r,
         ra_running_adj = ra) %>% 
  left_join(team_stats_2020) %>% 
  left_join(this_year_projections) %>% 
  left_join(last_year_results) %>% 
  mutate(war_adj = (war * games_2021 / g) %>% round(2),
         war_diff = war_proj - war_adj,
         wp_diff = war_diff / games_2021,
         pyth_old = r_running_adj^ex / (r_running_adj^ex + ra_running_adj^ex),
         r_exponent = ra_running_adj^ex * (wp_diff + pyth_old) / (1 - (wp_diff + pyth_old)),
         ra_exponent = r_running_adj^ex * (1 - wp_diff - pyth_old) / (wp_diff + pyth_old),
         r = (r_exponent^(1/ex) - r_running_adj) %>% round(2),
         ra = (ra_exponent^(1/ex) - ra_running_adj) %>% round(2))
}

step3a <-
  adjust_war(batting_results_2020, batting_projections_2021) %>% 
  select(tm, r)

step3b <-
  adjust_war(pitching_results_2020, pitching_projections_2021) %>% 
  select(tm, ra)
  
step3 <- 
  step3a %>%
  full_join(step3b)
    
step3 %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("out", "step3.csv"))

team_projections_2021 <- 
  apply_adjustments(team_projections_2021, step3)

```

Step 4: Sum up adjustments
```{r Step 4}

team_projections_2021 %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("out", "step4.csv"))

```

Step 5: Normalize all RS/RA to last year's environment of total runs
```{r Step 5}
# add the correct number of runs/allowed to each team so that the total projected for 2021 equals the 2020 162 game page

runs_projected_2021 <- 
  team_projections_2021 %>% 
  summarize(r = sum(r),
            ra = sum(ra)) %>% 
  mutate(year = '2021')

runs_pace_2020 <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  select(tm, g, r_2020:ra_2021) %>% 
  mutate(r_2020_162 = r_2020 * games_2021 / g,
         ra_2020_162 = ra_2020 * games_2021 / g) %>% 
  summarize(across(r_2020_162:ra_2020_162, sum)) %>% 
  rename(r = r_2020_162,
         ra = ra_2020_162) %>% 
  mutate(year = '2020')

team_count <-
  team_stats_2020 %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  pull()
  
runs_projected_adjustments <-
  tibble(r = (runs_pace_2020$r - runs_projected_2021$r) / team_count,
         ra = (runs_pace_2020$ra - runs_projected_2021$ra) / team_count)

team_projections_2021 <-
  team_projections_2021 %>% 
  rename(r_raw = r,
         ra_raw = ra) %>% 
  mutate(r = r_raw + runs_projected_adjustments$r,
         ra = ra_raw + runs_projected_adjustments$ra)
```

Step 6: Calculate expected wins via Pythagorean theorem
```{r Step 6}
team_projections_2021 <- 
  team_projections_2021 %>% 
  mutate(r_diff = r - ra,
         r_g = r / games_2021,
         ra_g = ra / games_2021,
         wp = r^ex / (r^ex + ra^ex)) %>% 
  select(tm, wp, r_diff, r_g, ra_g)

team_projections_2021 %>% 
  arrange(wp %>% desc()) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.numeric, ~round(., 3)) %>% 
  write_csv(here::here("out", "step5.csv"))
```
